item.title: SvLes1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Sevir.5G085400 Gene Symbol: SvLes1 Gene Name: Genome: Setaria viridis Species: Setaria viridis Functional Description: With CRISPR–Cas9 genome editing, we validated Less Shattering1 (SvLes1) as a gene whose product controls seed shattering.
